message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this unique product from me. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1900000. I believe this price reflects the product's value and is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1700000. I believe this price is fair and reasonable.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm counteroffering at $1850000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and my initial offer.
